H0.text: what is the legal age for marriage in australia. 16

H1.text: what is the legal age for marriage in australia. 21

H2.text: what is the legal age for marriage in australia. 19

H3.text: what is the legal age for marriage in australia. 18

A4.text: The general marriageable age in Australia is 18 years.

A5.text: The ages were equalised in 1991, with the relevant ages applying to females being raised to those applying to males.
